titleStmt.title: A philosophical endeavour towards the defence of the being of vvitches and apparitions. In a letter to the much honoured, Robert Hunt, esq; by a member of the Royal Society.
titleStmt.author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Grismond for James Collins, at the King's Arms in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: A member of the Royal Society = Joseph Glanvill.
Caption title on p. 1: Some considerations about witchcraft.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
